card.title: Welcome
card.text: Welcome to my Alexa Skill. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

voice.intro: Welcome to my Alexa Skill. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".
voice.prompt: If you want to try Star Wars story, say "Star Wars", or you can try Lifeline story, just say "Lifeline".

card.title: Welcome
card.text: Hi, I am your personal AI assistant. You are a little kid who was just chosen to be a Jedi Apprentice in the Jedi Temple. The first task for you is to listen to The Force, and tell me which Jedi master you want to follow.

voice.intro: Hi, I am your personal AI assistant. You are a little kid who was just chosen to be a Jedi Apprentice in the Jedi Temple. The first task for you is to listen to The Force, and tell me which Jedi master you want to follow. Tell me "Master Yoda" or "Master Anakin".

card.title: Jedi Observatory
card.prompt: You followed Master Yoda into the Jedi Observatory. Here, he wants you to choose a lightsaber you like.

voice.intro: You followed Master Yoda into the Jedi Observatory. Here, he wants you to choose a lightsaber you like.

card.title: President Office
card.prompt: You followed Master Yoda into the Senator Office. Here, he wants you to choose a lightsaber you like.

voice.intro: You followed Master Anakin into the Senator Office. Here, he wants you to choose a lightsaber you like. Tips: there is a hidden option for this question.
You chose a heavy lightsaber. Your lightsaber is made of gold. You must have a heart of gold.
voice.prompt: Say "Exit" to exit the game. Say "reset" to restart the game.

voice.intro: You chose a light lightsaber. You feel it floating over your hand.
voice.prompt: Say "Exit" to exit the game. Say "reset" to restart the game.

voice.intro: You chose a long lightsaber. You can strike your enemies before they can reach you.
voice.prompt: Say "Exit" to exit the game. Say "reset" to restart the game.

voice.intro: Congratulations! You found the hidden option. You chose a short lightsaber. You are better at stealth attack than other Jedi Knights.
voice.prompt: Say "Exit" to exit the game. Say "reset" to restart the game.

voice.intro: Hello? Is this thing working? Can anyone read me?
Oh, thank God! It's so good to have human contact! It's been hours! My name's Taylor. I am... was an astronaut on board the starship Varia.

Let's see. My ship just crashed in the middle of nowhere.
No one is hailing on this frequency, and I don't see any survivors other than me...
...the least prepared person in existence for this sort of emergency!
But I got out of the whole mess with nothing more than a stubbed toe, so things are looking just peachy.
Thanks for asking.

Our ship crashed on some moon.  I have no idea where. I managed to get to an escape pod, but I couldn't tell if anyone else made it into one.
My suit sensor tells me that the air here is breathable, at least, so that's nothing short of a miracle.But I've got no food or water rations on me.  The toolkit on the pod is about as basic as they come. I managed to get the pod's mobile transmitter working, but -- lucky you -- you seem to be the only one in range of the signal. Whoever and wherever you might be.

card.title: Intro
card.text: Tomorrow is the big Teddy Bear party, and you must definitely not let your owner forget about it... Would you like to help remind your owner David?

voice.intro: Tomorrow is the big Teddy Bear party, and you must definitely not let your owner forget about it... Would you like to help remind your owner David?
voice.prompt: Say yes if you wish to help or say reset to choose another game.

card.title: Bedroom
card.text: David, your owner, lies next to you on the bed, in a deep sleep.

voice.intro: David, your owner, lies next to you on the bed, in a deep sleep. He seems to be having a nightmare.
voice.prompt: Say hug david to help david fight monsters in his dream.

voice.intro: David remains sound asleep. You want to set an reminder on david's phone to remind him not to forget about your big party. First you have to get off the bed.
voice.prompt: Say get off the bed

voice.intro: You tumble down, but being a soft bear, that's ok. It feels a little bit chilly in the room. You want to wear your thick jacket to keep warm.
voice.prompt: Say run to cabinet to get your jacket.

voice.intro: Your warm winter jacket is here. This jacket is has a lot of pockets on it. It's good since you want to carry something useful for the road. It's a long way to David's phone, and you thought it's a good idea to ride David's cat Chester. But you don't know where she is. Her favorite treats and toys are here too. Which one would you carry with you?
voice.prompt: Say treats or rattled ball.

voice.intro: You take the rattled ball with you. Since your hand is really furry and the ball slips off your hand and rolls out of the bedroom.
voice.prompt: Say run to chase for the rattled ball.

voice.intro: You take the her treats with you. You walks out of the bedroom to the living room. Chester is asleep on the couch. You climbed on the couch. Now you want to wake her up. Would you pat her or scare her to wake her up.
voice.prompt: You can say pat her or scare her.

voice.intro: You run to the hallway. Chester is right here holding the ball in her hand. You asks nicely if she can take you to david's phone. Chester sys sure. But you have to help me figure out how many toys I have. I have 2 mouse, 2 boxes and 3 balls. Do I have 6 toys in total or 7.
voice.prompt: Tell me how many toys I have.

voice.intro: Chester wakes up gently. Luckily you can communicate with cat too. So you asks Chester to be your ride and gives her the treats. She agrees and you climbed onto her back.
voice.prompt: Say Thank you Chester.

voice.intro: Chester bites you on the arm. Good thing you are a fluffy teddy bear and can't feel pain. You apologize to chester.
voice.prompt: Say sorry chester

voice.intro: Chester carries you to the study . David's phone is right there on the desk. You press on home button for siri. You ask siri to send a reminder. But siri says okay. But you have to tell me which is the biggest number among 12, 7, 14
voice.prompt: Say the answer to set reminder.

voice.intro: Siri says you're right! Just tell me what would you like me to remind you.
voice.prompt: Say teddy bear party

voice.intro: Siri says wrong answer. Let's try again. What is the biggest number among 12, 14, 7
voice.prompt: Say the answer to set reminder

voice.intro: Siri says wrong answer. Let's try again. What is the biggest number among 12, 14, 7
voice.prompt: Say the answer to set reminder

voice.intro: Siri says you're right! Just tell me what would you like me to remind you.
voice.prompt: Say teddy bear party

voice.intro: Siri says wrong answer. And siri tells you 14 is the largest among 12. 14. 7
voice.prompt: Say 14 to set reminder

voice.intro: Siri says you're right! Just tell me what would you like me to remind you.
voice.prompt: Say teddy bear party

voice.intro: Siri says wrong answer. And siri tells you 14 is the largest among 12. 14. 7
voice.prompt: Say 14 to set reminder

voice.intro: Siri says okay. I'll remind you that tomorrow morning. You feel really happy and put the phone in your pocket. You must not let david know that you are alive at night. So you ask chester to take you back to bed before david finds out.
voice.prompt: Say chester take me to david

voice.intro: You return to bed safe and sound. You put david's phone on his nightstand. Hug him again. and wish for a great party tomorrow. This is the end of your adventure as a teddy bear.
voice.prompt: You can say reset to choose another story or say quit to end this game.

voice.intro: You return to bed safe and sound. You put david's phone on his nightstand. Hug him again. and wish for a great party tomorrow. This is the end of your adventure as a teddy bear.
voice.prompt: You can say reset to choose another story or say quit to end this game.

voice.intro: No. I actually have 7 toys. You see 2 plus 2 plus 3 is 7. But I will carry you to david anyways.
voice.prompt: Say Thank you chester

voice.intro: Chester says correct! I'll carry to david's phone.
voice.prompt: Say thank you chester.

voice.intro: Chester carries you to the study . David's laptop is right there on the desk. You want to ask siri to add a reminder for you.
voice.prompt: Say hey siri

voice.intro: Chester carries you to the study . David's laptop is right there on the desk. You want to ask siri to add a reminder for you.
voice.prompt: Say hey siri

voice.intro: Siri says. What can I help you with?
voice.prompt: Say set a reminder for tomorrow

voice.intro: Siri says. What can I help you with?
voice.prompt: Say set a reminder for tomorrow

voice.intro: Siri says. Okay. Just tell me what do you want me to remind you.
voice.prompt: Say teddy bear party

Chester forgives you. You give her the treats and ask. Can you take me to david's phone? I need to set a reminder for tomorrow's teddy bear party. Chester says okay. But you have to tell me do you like cat or dog more.
voice.prompt: say dog or cat to chester

voice.intro: Chester says. That's hurtful but I'll help you anyways. So you climb on to chester's back. And she carries you to david's phone. You want to add a reminder using siri.
voice.prompt: Say hey siri
